biography: Lauri is a talented golfer who hails from Pickala Golf Club.  He brings a consistent game to the course, making him a formidable opponent in any competition.

Lauri has a proven track record of success at the Hector Trophée, having competed in the tournament for three consecutive years, appearing in 2023, 2024 and 2025. While he is yet to claim the prestigious Hector Trophée or the Victor trophy, his dedication and skill are undeniable.  He is always a player to watch, and we anticipate a strong showing from him this year.
